titles.title: Demanding the return of the U.S.S. Pueblo to the United States Navy from North Korea.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Asia, the Pacific, and the Global Environment.

committee.subcommittee: Asia, the Pacific, and the Global Environment
committee.name: House Foreign Affairs

bill.summary: 1/23/2007--Introduced. Demands the return of the U.S.S. Pueblo to the U.S. Navy from North Korea. Directs the Clerk of the House of Representatives to transmit copies of this resolution to the President, the Secretary of Defense, and the Secretary of State.
